CustomField.description: This is the supplemental service duration to the original estimated duration. This is due to scope change from the original estimation. Scope change along with variance is added to the original estimated duration to get the revised duration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the supplemental service duration to the original estimated duration. This is due to scope change from the original estimation. Scope change along with variance is added to the original estimated duration to get the revised duration.
CustomField.label: Scope Change
